specify.reviewerNotes: Spec-reviewer approved at iteration 3/5. Phase-reviewer reached iteration cap (5/5) with 1 remaining warning about workflow-artifacts index page missing AC — addressed in final edit before commit.

phaseReview.reviewerNotes: Phase-reviewer cap reached. Final warning (workflow-artifacts index page) was fixed post-cap. All other issues resolved across 5 iterations.

create-plan.reviewerNotes: Plan-reviewer approved at iteration 1/5. Phase-reviewer reached cap (5/5) with 2 remaining warnings about verification completeness (tier_status/project_type in Step 3, rollback pre-condition in Step 7) — both addressed post-cap.

phaseReview.reviewerNotes: Phase-reviewer cap reached. Final warnings (verification field completeness, rollback pre-condition) were fixed post-cap. All blocker-level issues resolved across 5 iterations.

implement.reviewerNotes: All 3 reviewers (implementation, quality, security) approved in iteration 1. Final validation (iteration 2) confirmed approval. Only suggestion-severity issues found across both rounds — no blockers or warnings.

concerns: Reviewer wanted exact JSON schema examples inline for I1 output fields and I3 writer action format — spec.md defines these contracts; tasks reference spec by interface label
Reviewer wanted before/after diffs for session-start.sh injection — code block and pattern reference provided instead
Reviewer wanted grep pattern for YAML frontmatter extraction — implementation detail deferred to implementer
Multi-task sequential writes to same file (Tasks 7.2-7.5, 8.1-8.2) carry intermediate-state risk — placeholder comments added but reviewer wanted more scaffolding
YAML frontmatter description string differs between plan Step 6 and Task 6.1 — clarifying note added to task
Tasks 8.1-8.3 lacked recovery instruction equivalent to Task 7.2 — added post-cap
